Name: Abort Mode I-II
checklistText:
ABORT MODE I-II
(15,000 FEET TO 75,000 FEET)

BOOST INDICATORS MONITORED
ABORT LIGHT MONITORED
ABORT INDICATOR: RED
ANALYZE SITUATION AND DECIDE:
	1) EJECT (ABORT MODE I)
	2) RIDE-IT-OUT (ABORT MODE I-II)
RETRO ROCKET SQUIB SWITCHES: ARMED (PRE-LAUNCH)
ABORT CONTROL HANDLE: SHUTDOWN
WAIT 5 SECONDS FOR THRSUT DECAY
ABORT CONTROL HANDLE: ABORT
SEPARATION FROM LAUNCH VEHICLE
RETRO ROCKET SALVO FIRED
IF ABORT ALTITUDE < 25,000 FEET
	TIME DELAY 7 SECONDS
IF ABORT ALTITUDE < 75,000 FEET
	TIME DELAY 45 SECONDS
WAIT FOR TIME DELAY
JETTISON RETRO ADAPTER
MANEUVER S/C TO RE-ENTRY ATTITUDE
INITIATE NORMAL RE-ENTRY
DEPOLY DROGUE AT 40K FT.
DEPLOY MAIN/EMERGENCY CHUTE AT 10,6K FT.
INITIATE NORMAL LANDING & RECOVERY
